Posts.EditableText:
Alex, 

I just updated my game Dancing Storm with one change. I had modified my in-game background image but when you play it on-line it still shows the old version of the image. You can download my game offline and see the change on your computer but it doesn't work on-line, it seems?! 

Thanks, if you can get my game display updated, ASAP.

Craig.

Posts.EditableText: Could this be a problem with your cache (ctrl and F5 would clear it on a PC)?
Posts.HTML: Could this be a problem with your cache (ctrl and F5 would clear it on a PC)?
